name: Space Impact
description:
This game is created for the Brakeys game jam "let there be chaos". I'm new to game development and this is my first ever jam. If you tried this game, please leave some some feedback, it will help me in a lot of ways. Also,  I tired to build a webgl product but for some reason it stops loading after 90%.

How to play :

Destroy the incoming wave of enemy ships and gather collectables as you progress that allows you to use different type of weapons.

Controls :

WASD, Arrow keys -> movement

J-> weapon 1 (Default weapon)

K -> weapon 2

L -> weapon 3

O -> weapon 4

P -> weapon 5

Source code for this game : https://github.com/SabhariShrinivas/Space-Impact
